entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
